price: Na tuliwakhiari kwa ujuzi wetu kuliko walimwengu wenginewe.
arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Ninaapa: Tuliwakhiari Wana wa Israili kwa kuwa tuliwajua kwamba wao wana stahiki kuteuliwa kuliko watu wengine wote wa zama zao. Kwa hivyo tukawatuma miongoni mwao Manabii wengi kwa kuwa tulijua hali zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqadi ikh'tarnāhum ʿalā ʿil'min ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
